thread.title: BRIEF-Motorola Solutions Australia To Expand Victoria Contract

title: BRIEF-Motorola Solutions Australia To Expand Victoria Contract
text:
April 23, 2018 / 2:32 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Motorola Solutions Australia To Expand Victoria Contract Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Motorola Solutions Australia: 
* MOTOROLA SOLUTIONS AUSTRALIA - WILL EXPAND AND UPGRADE RADIO NETWORK SERVING VICTORIA POLICE, AMBULANCE VICTORIA AND METROPOLITAN FIRE BRIGADE 
* MOTOROLA SOLUTIONS AUSTRALIA - PARTNERSHIPS VICTORIA MANAGED SERVICE CONTRACT EXTENDED FOR SEVEN YEARS (VALUED AT AUD $261 MILLION) 
* MOTOROLA SOLUTIONS AUSTRALIA - PARTNERSHIPS VICTORIA MANAGED SERVICE CONTRACT CAN EXTEND FOR A FURTHER FIVE YEARS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
